IVE_Editor.PlugIns
Class PluginsServices

java.lang.Object
  IVE_Editor.PlugIns.PluginsServices

public class PluginsServices
extends java.lang.Object

This class collect all services from all plug-ins and offers them to another plug-ing which can use them. This is the interface point between all plug-ins so if someone has newly added some plug-in and wants it to offer some services to whole application author of this plug-in should write some methods through which he or she offers this services to the rest of application. That's the reason why this class is the only one which should be compiled with newly added plug-in and delivered with this plug-in to user.

Author:
Jirka
